WRITING.TEXT: So I have been checking discussion chats and forums but hardly anyone discussed this... White diamond's gem is different from her mural. Its not what some fans expected it to be. Isnt her gem suppose to be similar to Yellow's and Blue's instead of Pink's? Wont that make her defective instead of the 'perfect' diamond? I would like to discuss more! Maybe hear some theories of why her gem isnt what her mural depicts. *yes I know murals arent accurate like Pink and Blue but I still have a feeling that White shouldnt be having Pink's gem shape as older theories go, Pink is like a defective diamond. Though that is still a theory and a diamond could be another shape and be perfect
No no I know the gem is in her forehead and saw the gem. But Im talking about the shape of the gem. How it is exactly like Pink's and not like Yellow's or Blue's.

Good idea and she does probably set the standards of 'perfect' but if she was the one who sets it, doesnt She have to be perfect herself? XD And true. Other diamonds gems shapes arent perfect either. But the thing that bothers me is that if she is the so called ultimate diamond, the highest diamond there is and the most perfect one, wont she have to be absolutely perfect with no flaws etc? Like a perfect diamond shape no ups or downs. No flaws. Just one perfect cut gem.
True true. But now it makes me think that if Pink's gem is the same as White, wont she be perfect? Hahaha then again all diamonds are perfect

Well it depends. The diamonds treat other gems like tools yet the gems themselves are worshipping the Diamonds. Just like what Peridot said. They are perfect gem beings. So perhaps theres a link we are missing.

I see. Though I disagree with the perfection doesnt matter part. Perfection I think is a must. If they arent perfect, they cant lead and is just like the other gems. Yes they are programmed to obey but since they also have enough self awareness to break free, they must need something or someone whos perfect and strong like a leader (in this case a Diamond) to prevent them from breaking free and rebelling.
Ah i dont have any links to the mural. But the mural im referring to is the moon base mural. The diamonds' mural

Take it with a grain of salt* Because from my perspective, most Era 1 gems have powers and/or the ability to lead. Take Garnet. She could lead. And maybe if given, she could lead an entire army too. And as for powers, Sapphires for example has powers too. Basically, without perfection, diamonds are just like other gems and if you think about it, what if there is no diamonds? Without perfections and diamonds, could gem kind still go on? Most likely. You have zircons to show you information, you have aquamarine to remember every details, you have jaspers to lead and so on. If diamonds arent perfect, they are just like those regular gems. They would most probably at the same level as a Sapphire for Blue, Jasper for Yellow, Rose quarts for Pink and Pearls for White.
Then tell me whats the obvious answer then.
Um no? I was just asking about White diamond's gem shape and how perfection is everything to a diamond rather than equality
Then you explain to me. Cause I dont get it.
Look, I dont even know wtf is going on anymore. All I am curious is about is why White's gem is Pink's gem shape and not like a standard Diamond shape.

Yup which I dont mind the different cut but Im curious as to why the writers decide to give White the same cut. Is it because of another plot twist in the future? Or is because she isnt as perfect as we think she should be etc. Or is it just a typical plain aesthetic reasons which would be a bit of a bummer considering she is the ultimate villain.
Ohh then thats a bit bummer xD that her gem is that for aesthetic reasons instead of those crazy plot twist reasons
If thats so then its a bit of a disappointment. It wouldve been cooler or more exciting if the European cut for White is for another reason.
Perhaps. All we could do is wait till the next episode
Its ok!

Yes they arent finalized but there is another weird point. I remembered it was by The Roundtable. About how the murals are incorrect but despite that, Garnet's flashback (by that flashback, all the designs is finalized mostly) of Pink's battle with them was Pink looking like her Mural. Though Garnet's flashback isnt that accurate as well. So its weird
I see i see. But its a bit disappointing that her gem's design isnt a the way it was suppose to be for a special reason other than unfinished design/aesthetic.

WRITING.TITLE: Braces trouble! Is the dentist really correct?
WRITING.TEXT: Long story short, Dentist wants to bail out on braces before the top teeth is fully neat and in. Is that even allowed? Like arent braces suppose to make it completely neat and in? Long story below, I have rabbit teeth. Its almost 2 years/passed 2 years since I got my braces but this time, its really bad. For the past few months, my dentist did not touch my top brace at all. No changing of rubber or wire. Nothing. And instead, he focused on the bottom row and gave me the rubber for me to wear which I did. Shouldnt he change the rubber as its hygienic and put/remove the wires? But despite wearing them as frequent as I could, there is hardly any movement on the top. And yet the dentist wishes to so called bail out on the braces which he claims that its no use and theres no point of wearing braces. And frankly I find it kinda rude that he claims I wasnt 'that interested in treating myself' when I clearly am. AND! My top row is only protruding a bit. Cant he like handle it before claiming it doesnt work? He wants to remove the braces completely before the top row is done. Instead, he 'suggested' that i do filing instead to make it 'go in' which is bullshit in my eyes as my teeth is still protruding out instead of it being long. I think the clinic trying to scam money. I even paid last payment last time but was told theres 1 more which was odd. But nonetheless, I will pay this last time. *scam money by not completing treatment and do more expensive options which is not needed. I would like to have some answers and solution... I want to fix my teeth completely instead of a half-assed job like that...

WRITING.TITLE: Impacted wisdom tooth pulling on my cheek vein?
WRITING.TEXT: Hello! A little info first, Im 20 years old with braces and have all 4 wisdom teeth. 3 of them are fine and are erupting with no issues except the bottom left one. It has erupted too off to the side where my cheek is and the feeling I can closely describe is its literally pulling my cheek and/or one of its vein. Right now its slightly swollen and I couldnt chew well on the left side since the top left's wisdom tooth keeps poking on the sensitive gum. *unfortunately i havent gotten an updated x-ray so I couldnt show anything rn. The tooth seems to be tilted. Is this normal? And should i remove it asap or wait till i remove my braces? Or just leave it be and wait for noticable changes? Pretty worried as Ive heard tales of nerve damage...
I see, thank you! Ill ask :)
Can i even post the sauce? Its literally a link to someone's profile and i feel like its against the rules.

WRITING.TITLE: Nice guy vibe in game (Granblue fantasy)
Freedom
WRITING.TEXT: I just wish to go somewhere peaceful and quiet. To be free and relax. Life has been tiring. Just want to find a place for solace.

WRITING.TITLE: Wanting an impossible and contradicting wish for a long time
WRITING.TEXT: There's something I want the most when I was young and it still holds true but its impossible to achieve it. I want to be at peace and free. With no worries or woes. No sadness no nothing. Just peace in my mind and body. No need to worry about survival like food or shelter. In a place with no pain, no sadness. Just peace and quiet where one would be free. But that's the contradiction. One cannot achieve that wish without money these days. Money is survival. But in order to survive, one must suffer to get it. Enduring pain and torments for the basic necessities. And if one wants to be at peace, they have to suffer. Its a never-ending cycle. Want freedom? Money. Want peace? Money. Want to survive? Money. Want money? Suffer. Don't want to suffer? Money. I cannot achieve this wish. No matter how much I try. Cause I am just not lucky enough. Horrible parents, terrible school experience and most importantly, poor. I'm pretty tired from this never-ending cycle. And that's ok, maybe one day, I will find my place of peace. I will just keep wishing.
